item.title: There’s AI Inside Windows Paint and Notepad Now. Here’s How to Use It
item.description: AI tools have arrived in two of the most basic and long-serving Windows utilities. Here’s what they do and how you can turn them off if you prefer.

item.title: Your Favorite Sex Toy Brand Might Go Under
item.description: There’s still a 145 percent tariff on China, and sex toys aren’t part of the electronics exemption.
